content.question: A magnetic field of magnitude <math alttext="4.0 teslas " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is directed at an angle of <math alttext="30 degrees " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> to the plane of a rectangular loop of area <math alttext="5.0 square meters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> , as shown above. What is the magnetic flux through the loop?

choices.label: <math alttext="10 tesla square meters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="12 tesla square meters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="17 tesla square meters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>17</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="20 tesla square meters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="40 tesla square meters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>40</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="10 tesla square meters" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
